description: Take the morning grapefruit up a notch with an irresistible brulee topping. This clever recipe is super-easy and ready in just 10 minutes.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Aug 2021,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat
name: Grapefruit Brulee Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Macro Organic honey and macadamia granola

recipeInstructions.text: Line a small baking tray with loosely scrunched foil. Place grapefruit, cut-side up, on tray. Sprinkle evenly with sugar. Using a blowtorch (see Tip), caramelise sugar for 20 seconds or until melted and dark golden. Serve topped with yoghurt and granola.
